options.command: if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Windows" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need windows)'; exit 0; fi && ./epsilon --module epsilon.windows --eval t
if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Windows" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need windows)'; exit 0; fi && ./epsilon --test epsilon.windows
if [ "$(uname -s)" != "Windows" ]; then echo 'Skipping: wrong platform (need windows)'; exit 0; fi && echo 'Lint: epsilon.windows'
